Posts.Content: Hi i also have lynphedema but mine is in my right arm i had breast cancer 8 years ago and had a lympectomy with 4 months of chemo and 32 radation treatment i have found that keeping busy helps i have horse's and clean the barn sometimes it retains fluid and i have a pump that i put my arm and that help i also do a lymphedema massage that help's hope this is helpful i live in Waterford Wis. take care and God Bless Claudia
Posts.Title: lymphedema

Posts.Content: Hi Kellie, I also had a swollen arm from having a lumpectomy and chemo and radation it has been 4 years and I just used a sleeve when I worked outside but now it is ok so I think in time yours will be ok too. Claudia H
Posts.Title: Lymph glands still swollen 6 months after surgery
